roleset.name: assign attribution to
roleset.note: ATTRIBUTE-V NOTES: This might be the only verb (so far) where the attribute comes beforethe entity with the attribute. Curious.(from attribute.01-v)

example.name: typical usage
example.text: Mr. Hahn attributes the gains to the philosophy of concentrating on what a company knows best.
example.arg: to the philosophy of concentrating on what a company knows best.

roleset.name: able to be attributed to
roleset.note: ATTRIBUTABLE-J NOTES: Based on Thyme data. Comaparison to attribute.01-v. (from attributable.01-j)

example.name: typical usage
example.text: He finds “misuse of the offending term attributable to spurious erudition on the part of the writers combined with scientific illiteracyon the part of copy editors.”
example.arg: to spurious erudition on the part of the writers combined with scientific illiteracy on the part of the copy editors
